mdRecord.dcterms:title: Office of the North American Land Company: No. 155, Chesnut Street, Philadelphia, June 9, 1806 : Sir, I inclose you, as shareholder in the stock of the North American Land Company, a copy of the original Articles of Agreement and Association of the said Company, together with a copy of the alterations to be made therein as proposed at the last annual meeting of the shareholders
Sir, I inclose you, as shareholder in the stock of the North American Land Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: With signature of James Greenleaf, Secretary.
James Greenleaf's copy, with his copies of the "Plan of Association" (Philadelphia, 1795) and the amendments ([Philadelphia, 1806]). Annotations by Greenleaf in the "Plan of Association."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: North American Land Company.
Land companies--United States
